list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a feeling of needing or wanting to drink something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they quenched their thirst with spring water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ dập tắt cơn khát của họ với nước suối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person or animal) feel a need to drink something.
